product_overview: Bravita is a performance-focused, modern Single Page Application e-commerce platform built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It provides a seamless user experience with secure authentication, product and cart management, and a smooth checkout flow integrated with Supabase backend services.
core_goals: Enable secure and user-friendly authentication with session management and password recovery.
Provide efficient product and cart management with real-time UI updates and localStorage synchronization.
Ensure a robust checkout process including address selection, promo code validation, and order creation with backend verification.
Offer comprehensive user profile management including order history, address book, and password updates.
Facilitate admin capabilities for managing orders, products, users, and promotional codes through an admin dashboard.
key_features: User Authentication with email/password login, signup, password recovery, and profile completion.
Shopping Cart management with add, update quantity, and remove product functionalities synchronized with localStorage.
Checkout process with address selection, promo code validation connecting to backend RPCs, and order confirmation flow.
User Profile page encompassing order history, address management, and password update.
Admin Dashboard for managing orders, products, users, and promo codes.
Public facing landing page and custom 404 not found page.
Reusable UI components including loaders, promotions marquee, GIFs, and cookie consent dialog.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via authentication flow using email and password, with session persistence.
User browses products and adds items to their shopping cart with instant UI feedback.
User proceeds to checkout, selects delivery address from saved addresses, applies promo codes validated by backend, and completes the order.
User views their profile to manage personal information, review order history, update address and change password.
Admins log into admin panel to manage orders, products, user accounts, and promotions efficiently.
All users access landing page initially; unmatched URLs route to a custom 404 page.
validation_criteria: Authentication succeeds with valid credentials and denies invalid attempts with proper error messages.
Cart updates reflect in UI immediately and persist correctly using localStorage synchronization.
Promo codes are validated against backend RPCs, and invalid codes are rejected before order creation.
Order creation RPC succeeds after successful checkout with accurate pricing verified by backend.
User profile updates including password changes reflect correctly and maintain security.
Admin dashboard functions provide comprehensive data management capabilities and reflect real-time data changes.
Public pages load correctly and handle invalid routes gracefully with a 404 page.
